unnormalised: **Builder Reviews: Are You Doing Your Homework?**
normalised: **Builder Reviews: Are You Doing Your Homework?**

unnormalised: Mumbai: Buying a home is a huge decision, especially in a city like Mumbai. But are you just swept away by the fancy brochures and show flats? Experts are urging potential homebuyers to seriously consider builder reviews before signing on the dotted line.
normalised: Mumbai: Buying a home is a huge decision, especially in a city like Mumbai. But are you just swept away by the fancy brochures and show flats? Experts are urging potential homebuyers to seriously consider builder reviews before signing on the dotted line.

unnormalised: "It's like choosing a good vada pav wala, you ask around, right? Buying property is the same, but with much bigger stakes," says Dr. Sharma, a real estate analyst at IIM Ahmedabad.
normalised: "It's like choosing a good vada pav wala, you ask around, right? Buying property is the same, but with much bigger stakes," says Doctor Sharma, a real estate analyst at I I M Ahmedabad.

unnormalised: Several online platforms are now dedicated to aggregating builder reviews, offering insights into construction quality, delivery timelines, and after-sales service. Imagine finding out after paying Rs. 2 Crores that your "dream home" in Bandra has chronic water leakage!
normalised: Several online platforms are now dedicated to aggregating builder reviews, offering insights into construction quality, delivery timelines, and after-sales service. Imagine finding out after paying rupee two crore that your "dream home" in Bandra has chronic water leakage!

unnormalised: One recent review mentioned a delay of 18 months on a project near Thane, plus issues with the promised green space, only 500 sq ft instead of the advertised 1000 sq ft.
normalised: One recent review mentioned a delay of eighteen months on a project near Thane, plus issues with the promised green space, only five hundred square feet instead of the advertised one thousand square feet.

unnormalised: Do your research, folks. Talk to existing residents, check online forums, and remember, a little homework can save you a lot of heartache (and Rs.!). Don't just believe what Mr. Gupta, the smooth-talking sales guy, tells you. Happy house hunting!
normalised: Do your research, folks. Talk to existing residents, check online forums, and remember, a little homework can save you a lot of heartache (and rupees!). Don't just believe what Mister Gupta, the smooth-talking sales guy, tells you. Happy house hunting!
